1.0.name: wordpress/scoopit-for-jetpack
1.0.description:
Extends the Jetpack plugin and allows you to add a Scoop.it sharing button to the list of sharing services available under Settings > Sharing in your dashboard.

Important: for this plugin to work, you must activate Jetpack first, and activate the Sharing module.

This plugin is a work in progress. You can report issues here, or submit a pull request on GitHub.
